Package org.bff.javampd.playlist

Class MPDPlaylist

java.lang.Object
org.bff.javampd.playlist.MPDPlaylist
All Implemented Interfaces:
Playlist
public class MPDPlaylist extends Object implements Playlist
MPDPlaylist represents a playlist controller to a MPD server. To obtain an instance of the class you must use the getMPDPlaylist method from the MPD connection class.
Author:
Bill

    • getSongList

      public List<MPDPlaylistSong> getSongList()
      Description copied from interface: Playlist
      Returns the list of songs in the playlist. This does query the MPD server for the list so care should be taken not to call it excessively.
